programme.desc: Walt and his employee Greg catch big hand-painted bluegill and largemouth bass.

programme.title: Bill Dance Saltwater

programme.title: Reel Animals
programme.desc: Blue water, green water, and everything in between. Captain Mike and Nick fish for cobia, snook and trout out of South Seas Island Resort.

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: Capt. Scott Walker and Capt. Steve Rodger head out for an adventure and dinner in search for tile fish and cobias.

programme.title: Lund The Ultimate Fishing Experience

programme.desc: Scott takes on a big challenge in Florida for some big Bass.

programme.title: Everything Eichler
programme.desc: Trent tries to overcome his bad luck on turkeys. Jeb takes care of some chores before heading out with his crossbow.

programme.title: The Sporting Chef
